DOC.HEADLINE: NEWSWIRE : TENNIS
DOC.TEXT: Fourth-seeded Mary Pierce of France overpowered wild-card entry Asa Carlsson of Sweden , 6-2 , 6-2 , in the semifinals of the $ 400 # 000 Virginia Slims of Houston . Skiing Thomas Grandi of Banff , Canada , went from sixth place after the first run to win the men ' s giant slalom in the U.S. Alpine Championships at Winter Park , Colo . Grandi , . 65 seconds behind first-run leader Chris Puckett of Crested Butte , Colo. , had a second run of 1 minute , 10.08 seconds that was more_than a second faster than any other skier . That gave him a combined time of 2:17.71. Jeremy Nobis of Park City , Utah , finished second in 2:18.46. Puckett was third in 2:19.18 .
